adrFormatAddress: 620 Columbus Ave # 2, New York, NY 10024-1459, USA

originalText.text: As a fellow health care provider, I feel obliged to comment on the exemplary care I received from Dr. Weiss and his team. It started with the initial phone call requesting an appointment. In contrast to the modern day model of speaking to an off site phone bank, I spoke to an extremely helpful representative in Dr. Weiss’s office who immediately helped schedule my procedure. Prior to the procedure, the staff was fantastic with clear communication. I had my procedure at the Carnegie Hill Endoscopy Center. The staff members  there were equally warm, caring and professional. Dr. Weiss demonstrated expertise, empathy and confidence in the procedure. I would give my highest recommendation.

text.text: As a fellow health care provider, I feel obliged to comment on the exemplary care I received from Dr. Weiss and his team. It started with the initial phone call requesting an appointment. In contrast to the modern day model of speaking to an off site phone bank, I spoke to an extremely helpful representative in Dr. Weiss’s office who immediately helped schedule my procedure. Prior to the procedure, the staff was fantastic with clear communication. I had my procedure at the Carnegie Hill Endoscopy Center. The staff members  there were equally warm, caring and professional. Dr. Weiss demonstrated expertise, empathy and confidence in the procedure. I would give my highest recommendation.

originalText.text: Dr. Weiss is personable and professional. He listened carefully to my symptoms and performed a thorough exam.  He clearly explained his findings and recommended a course of action for my condition. He scheduled a follow-up procedure the following week, which I greatly appreciated.  I would highly recommend him to family and friends.

text.text: Dr. Weiss is personable and professional. He listened carefully to my symptoms and performed a thorough exam.  He clearly explained his findings and recommended a course of action for my condition. He scheduled a follow-up procedure the following week, which I greatly appreciated.  I would highly recommend him to family and friends.

originalText.text:
Dr.Weiss throughly explained my condition and even drew a diagram to show me in plain terms what is going on. He then went through each treatment option, explained how they work and the pluses/ minuses of each.
To sum it up, it's like a Contractor giving you a quote with just a price as compared to one giving a full written scope along with the price.

originalText.text: Dr Weiss is very professional and caring. As a returning patient, he listened to my symptoms carefully, answered my questions, gave me some lifestyle suggestions and offered me a treatment that really works. It's really helped to ease my anxiety. In addition, he helps me to work through my insurance coverage for the prescription. Highly recommended.

originalText.text: Dr. Weiss does not keep you waiting.  He's very concise, not an alarmist.  He responds quickly to my text between visits.  I trust him to take care of business.
